entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4 except minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 except minus 8 inland. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then a few rain showers or flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
